body: I was thinking that Avicus could have practice servers for teams if it isn't too much work. You could ask a mod if you could have a whitelisted nebula map for a certain time to practice or scrim on with your team.

title: Practice Servers?

What about. Several practice servers are gone live, but teams can use them for both practice and scrims. 

Multi-purpose servers in a way.
